name: More Labs, Inc.
description: Provider of supplementary drinks intended to address different areas of health and wellness, including energy, focus, sleep and recovery. The company's drinks are a liquid dietary supplement that contains Dihydromyricetin (DHM) which has anti-hepatotoxic properties to help detoxify the body, enabling consumers to boost the body's natural response.
one_liner: Provider of supplementary drinks intended to address different areas of health and wellness, including energy, focus, sleep and recovery. The company's drinks are a liquid dietary supplement that contains Dihydromyricetin (DHM) which has anti-hepatotoxic properties to help detoxify the body, enabling consumers to boost the body's natural response.
